description: This source file defines a utility class ApiRequestContextHolder that manages ThreadLocal storage for ApiRequestContext objects, enabling thread-safe handling of request-specific data in a web application.

classes.name: ApiRequestContextHolder
classes.description: A utility class providing thread-local management of ApiRequestContext instances, including methods to get, set, and clear the context.

methods.name: clearContext
methods.description: Removes the ApiRequestContext instance from the current thread's local storage.

methods.name: getContext
methods.description: Retrieves the ApiRequestContext for the current thread, creating a new instance if none exists.
